headline: Is Salesforce Inc. (CRM) the Best Enterprise Software Stock to Buy Now?
summary: We recently published a list of 12 Best Enterprise Software Stocks to Buy Now. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Salesforce Inc. (NYSE:CRM) stands against other best enterprise software stocks to buy now. In 2024, the global enterprise market size was estimated at $263.79 billion, according to Grand View […]

headline: Salesforce (NYSE:CRM) Declares 4% Dividend Increase Despite 11% Weekly Stock Slide
summary: Salesforce (NYSE:CRM) recently declared a 4% increase in quarterly dividends, reflecting strategic financial management amidst challenging market conditions. Concurrently, its collaboration with Deloitte aims to deliver AI-driven industry solutions, bolstering business appeal. This positive news contrasts sharply with the broader stock market downturn, where a 10.82% decline in Salesforce's share price was observed. The drop aligns with widespread investor anxiety following significant tariff...
